name: COMPASS Development Environment
postCreateCommand: pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt
updateContentCommand:
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y sqlite3 libsqlite3-dev build-essential zlib1g-dev libffi-dev libssl-dev libbz2-dev libreadline-dev wget && \
wget https://www.sqlite.org/2024/sqlite-autoconf-3470000.tar.gz && \
tar -xvzf sqlite-autoconf-3470000.tar.gz && cd sqlite-autoconf-3470000 && ./configure && make && sudo make install && \
wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.12.1/Python-3.12.1.tgz && \
tar -xvzf Python-3.12.1.tgz && cd Python-3.12.1 && ./configure --enable-loadable-sqlite-extensions && make && sudo make install
